amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for collective bargaining by TSA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement the determination of the Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration regarding transporation security officers and collective bargaining as described in the decision memorandum dated February 4, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rokita amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 205 (Roll no. 403).
